member.name: T:GHTool.ActionCommand
member.summary: Implements the action command.

member.name: T:GHTool.ActionRunDeleteCommand
member.summary: Implements the action run delete command.

member.name: T:GHTool.CommandAttribute
member.summary: Used to tag a for automatic inclusion in a program.

member.name: M:GHTool.CommandAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Optionally disables the command, preventing it fromm being recognized by the program.

member.name: P:GHTool.CommandAttribute.Disabled
member.summary: Indicates when the command is disabled.

member.name: T:GHTool.CommandBase
member.summary: An abstract class that has default implementations for selected members.

member.name: P:GHTool.CommandBase.CheckOptions
member.summary: Indicates that unknown command options should be checked against . This defaults to true.

member.name: T:GHTool.ICommand
member.summary: Implements a command.

member.name: P:GHTool.ICommand.Words
member.summary: Returns the command words.
member.remarks: This property is used to map the command line arguments to a command implemention. In the simple case, this will be a single word. You may also specify multiple words.

member.name: P:GHTool.ICommand.AltWords
member.summary: Returns optional alternative command words like: "ls" for "list", or "rm" for "remove".

remarks.note: This should return null if there are no alternate words and if there is an alternate, the number of words must be the same as returned be for the command.

member.name: P:GHTool.ICommand.ExtendedOptions
member.summary: Returns the array of extended command line options beyond the common options supported by the command or an empty array if none. The option names must include the leading dash(es).

member.name: P:GHTool.ICommand.CheckOptions
member.summary: Indicates that unknown command options should be checked against .

member.name: M:GHTool.ICommand.NeedsSshCredentials(Neon.Common.CommandLine)
member.summary: Returns true if the command requires server SSH credentials to be specified on the command line via the -u/--user and -p/--password options vs. obtaining them from the currently logged in cluster secrets or not needing credentials at all.

member.name: P:GHTool.ICommand.SplitItem
member.summary: Returns the item used to split a command line into two parts with the left part having standard neon-cli options and the right part being a command that will be executed remotely. This returns as null for commands that don't split.

member.name: M:GHTool.ICommand.Help
member.summary: Displays help for the command.

member.name: M:GHTool.ICommand.RunAsync(Neon.Common.CommandLine)
member.summary: Runs the command.

member.name: T:GHTool.GitHubRepoPath
member.summary: Abstracts GitHub repo paths like: github.com/owner/repo.

member.name: M:GHTool.GitHubRepoPath.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a GitHub repository path.
member.exception: Thrown when the input is invalid.

remarks.note: github.com will be assumed when no server is specified.

member.name: M:GHTool.GitHubRepoPath.#ctor
member.summary: Static constructor.

member.name: P:GHTool.GitHubRepoPath.Server
member.summary: Returns the server part of the path.

member.name: P:GHTool.GitHubRepoPath.Owner
member.summary: Returns the owner part of the path.

member.name: P:GHTool.GitHubRepoPath.Repo
member.summary: Returns the repo part of the path.

member.name: T:GHTool.Program
member.summary: Hosts the program entry point.

member.name: M:GHTool.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The program entry point.

member.name: M:GHTool.Program.GetCommand(Neon.Common.CommandLine,System.Collections.Generic.List{GHTool.ICommand})
member.summary: Attempts to match the command line to the to be used to implement the command.

member.name: M:GHTool.Program.Exit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Exits the program returning the specified process exit code.

member.name: P:GHTool.Program.Name
member.summary: Returns the program name.

member.name: P:GHTool.Program.Version
member.summary: Returns the program version.

member.name: P:GHTool.Program.CommandLine
member.summary: Returns the orignal program .

member.name: P:GHTool.Program.GitHubPAT
member.summary: Returns the current user's GITHUB_PAT token.
